title: Slow cooker pulled chicken
ingredients: ['4 large skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '250ml ketchup', '2 tablespoons mustard', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '125ml maple syrup', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 dashes hot sauce or to taste', '8 rolls or baps, split']
